member.name: DLGITEMTEMPLATE
member.summary: Defines the dimensions and style of a control in a dialog box. One or more of these structures are combined with a structure to form a standard template for a dialog box.

member.name: DLGITEMTEMPLATE.style
member.summary: The style of the control. This member can be a combination of window style values (such as WS_BORDER) and one or more of the control style values (such as BS_PUSHBUTTON and ES_LEFT).

member.name: DLGITEMTEMPLATE.dwExtendedStyle
member.summary: The extended styles for a window. This member is not used to create controls in dialog boxes, but applications that use dialog box templates can use it to create other types of windows. For a list of values, see Extended Window Styles.

member.name: DLGITEMTEMPLATE.x
member.summary: Thex-coordinate, in dialog box units, of the upper-left corner of the control. This coordinate is always relative to the upper-left corner of the dialog box's client area.

member.name: DLGITEMTEMPLATE.y
member.summary: They-coordinate, in dialog box units, of the upper-left corner of the control. This coordinate is always relative to the upper-left corner of the dialog box's client area.

member.name: DLGITEMTEMPLATE.cx
member.summary: The width, in dialog box units, of the control.

member.name: DLGITEMTEMPLATE.cy
member.summary: The height, in dialog box units, of the control.
